A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: My dog could write a more fitting sequel to the franchise than this hot mess. Every time you think they are just about to pull off a truly interesting twist\, a plot that might actually go somewhere and be fresh and relevant and in line with the entire universe that's been established\, they slap you in the face and lecture you for your old-fashion ways. Silly me. I thought characters were at least supposed to act and behave logically\, to some extent.
